commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Looks like we've got you, Ayumu, Karin, Emma, and Kana from Nijigasaki?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Though truthfully, everyone wanted to be here.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: But without a place to sleep, it just wasn't possible. We can't have people camping outside.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I can fall asleep wherever.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I know.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Giggle* Even the rocking of this train is kinda making me sleepy... *Snore*

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Wow, Kanata really can fall asleep anywhere. I wish I could do that...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You're just jealous because you can't sleep without your favorite pillow, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hahaha... How'd your group decide on who to send today?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: We figured it out pretty quickly. Nico-chi, Rin, and Hanayo had someplace they just HAD to go to for the School Idol Festival, so they whisked us away to camp.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Maki and Umi had some family matters to deal with that kept them home, but they said they trust all of us to take care of everything.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: So it's all on us then!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: More importantly...Honoka? Could you please stop eating and at least try to join in the conversation?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Huh? Oh, sorry. It's just that train stations have the BEST boxed lunches, y'know?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You can't take a train without getting a boxed lunch!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I'm not disagreeing with you, but you're already on your second one.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hahaha, I couldn't help myself. It's SO good.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Well, you just keep stuffing your face then. Don't blame me if you don't have room for dinner!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, but like... *Chomp* *Munch* Mmm! Grilled eel boxed lunches are soooo good!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Look, now you've got rice on your face.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Huh? Where?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: On the side of your mouth.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Here?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Other side.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Huh? What? Where?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Honoka, sit still for a sec. There. Got it!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks, Kotori.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Look at you two. You're like an old married couple. It's so cute.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: An old married couple?! Why can't we be newlyweds?!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Oh, Honoka...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You two ARE awfully close.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Well, yeah! We've known each other for ages!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Honoka, Umi, and I have been together since we were little kids.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, wow. So you three grew up together, huh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I guess that explains why you're all so close.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You three I understand, but μ's is a pretty close-knit group as a whole, too.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I think all of you at Nijigasaki are really close too, though.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I suppose we don't NOT get along?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What kind of answer is that?! Of course we're close!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Uh-huh! I love everyone in our club!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* Looks like you get along just fine. I'm guessing you're to thank for that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I haven't done anything.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's not true. You're always working so hard for us!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah! You've helped us out so much.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I couldn't deny that even if I wanted to. Thanks for everything. I really appreciate it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Haha... You guys are making me blush.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Ooooh! Someone's popular.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hey, totally off-topic, but have any of you been to Numazu before?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Out of us Nijigasaki girls...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Just me, maybe?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What's it like? Any nice places?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So many! The air is clean and fresh, the ocean is beautiful, and there are tons of sightseeing spots!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And above all, the food there is amazing. The seafood is a given, but pretty much everything there is incredible!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Food?! Ooh, now I'm REALLY looking forward to it! Can't this train go any faster?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I'm glad you're excited, but we're not going there just to have a good time.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I know, I know. Work first, play later.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: More importantly! Who's up for some cards?! Come on, let's play!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hey, come on, Kanata! Wake up! Let's play cards!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Bwuh?! Are we there yet?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We've still got a while 'til we get to Numazu, so I challenge you all to a game of cards!
